title: Visit riot Sydney
body:
Hello, I was wondering if riot Sydney allow visits to their office, it is my last day in Sydney of my three day holiday and also my birthday. I think it would be pretty awesome myself, I understand if it's not possible.

Thank you for any replies!

replies.body:
The only Riot Games location open to tours, as of right now, is the new **Los Angeles** HQ. You can read more about that [here](http://www.riotgames.com/tours).

It's possible that **Sydney** HQ may be opened for tours in the future, but that's not possible right now.
Ok thank you, have a nice Monday!
